(583x1+0)/1 mod 2048 = 583. (583x3+1)/2 mod 1024 = 875. (583x9+5)/4 mod 512 = 289. (583x27+19)/8 mod 256 = 178. (583x27+19)/16 mod 128 = 89. (583x81+73)/32 mod 64 = 6. (583x81+73)/64 mod 32 = 3. (583x243+283)/128 mod 16 = 5. (583x729+977)/256 mod 8 = 0. (583x729+977)/512 mod 4 = 0. (583x729+977)/1024 mod 2 = 0. (583x729+977)/2048 mod 1 = 0.
